cu.explanation_en: Setting the DRB ciphering to an invalid value 'invalid' will cause configuration parsing error and prevent the CU from negotiating security properly.

du.explanation_en: Setting the hardware log level to an invalid value 'invalid' will cause configuration parsing error and prevent the DU from starting properly.
du.explanation_zh: 將硬體日誌級別設定為無效值 'invalid' 會導致配置解析錯誤，並阻止 DU 正確啟動。
